info.name: Toodledo Neodark
info.description: Dark skin for Toodledo. Currently works only on tasks.toodledo.com.
info.additionalInfo:
Tested only in Firefox 62 - 65.

If you have some parts white after opening the website for the first time, switch to "Folders" and back to correctly initialize.

https://gitlab.com/haluzpav/toodledo-neodark-theme

2019-01-11: support for subtasks and multi-line view, fixed some alerts and pop-ups with white background
